title: U.N. Inspectors Find No Evidence for Russian ‘Dirty Bomb’ Claim
description: The International Atomic Energy Agency examined three sites where Russia claimed Ukraine was building a radiation dispersal bomb but turned up no indications of illicit activity.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: Residents gathering firewood in Tsupivka, a town in Ukraine’s Kharkiv region that was occupied for months by Russian forces, on Wednesday.
